blog.name: sesshaxiii
blog.title: My Art and Junk!
blog.description: I'm an aspiring artist with ADHD and a million ideas in my head. I started out with mostly pokemon but have since then spreaded my horizons. I do still draw pokemon, but also draw anthros and whatever comes to mind. Still need to get back into drawing comics though. I'd love any help or suggestions you can give to help me improve more! Any support is always greatly appreciated!! Currently applying for SVA in Manhattan New York City for animation. Also check out my PMD comic and my upcoming original comic! Other places you can find me DevientArt Furaffinity some work is NSFW Ko-Fi Give me a coffee, get some art! Support me on Patreon! My Twitter! https://twitter.com/SesshaX

blog.name: forbrighterdays-comic
blog.title: For Brighter Days
blog.description:
{A Pokemon fan comic by artist BloomingHead } - Unova is being torn apart by a war, lead by a narcissistic man. Sick of watching this war go on, Chizue decides to take things in her own hands! Accompanied by her friends Cheren and Bell Chizue goes on the journey of her life and soon enough she finds herself in the center of a rebellion!
(Joshua, he/they, German English)

blog.name: pokemonkalos
blog.title: Pokemon Kalos
blog.description: Get reay for this adventure through the Kalos region in the Pokemon Universe!Written By: aurasoulhikari and kimmyko

title: Pokemon Journey of Kalos
body:
Essence, Claire, and Aries belong to Kimmy-ko while Lucy and Allen belongs to me so enjoy.

Chapter 5

“So this is Santalune Forest”.

The group were walking to Santalune City for their first gym battle but had to cross the forest first. “Yeah once we cross Santalune Forest we’ll be at Santalune City easy”, Lucy said.

“Wow this place is awesome”! Aries grinned, looking around the forest gleefully.

“Such beauty of nature”!

The girls and their pokemon sweatdropped while Slash sighed. “He’s a grass type trainer alright”, Lucy sighed.

“Oh the others should enjoy this”, Aries grinned, getting out two pokeballs.

“Come out Chestnut, Blade”!

Aries’s Chespie was sent out along with a Grovyle to Lucy’s and Claire’s surprise. “A Grovyle”, Claire gasped, getting out her pokedex.

Grovyle, the Wood Gecko pokemon and the evolved form of Treecko. Grovyle has powerful legs which allow it to move quickly and jump with great power

“This is my Grovyle, Blade I got him as my starter when he was a Treecko”, Aries grinned.

“Grov”, Blade nodded.

“Wait starter? You’re from Hoenn”? Lucy said surprised.

“I thought you were from Sinnoh like Essence”, Claire said.

“Nah I’m from Hoenn and started my journey there I met Essence when I decided to go to Sinnoh”, Aries explained.

“And I’ve been stuck with him since”, Essence sighed.

“Oh you know you love me Essey”, Aries grinned.

“Yeah,yeah”, Essence said lightly.

Lucy and Claire blinked at the two before looking at one another and shrugged. “Guess that’s how they always act”, Lucy remarked.

“Why not we let out all our pokemon for a small break”.

“That sounds good”, Claire nodded.

They all let out their pokemon as they sat and relaxed Essence noticed Aura sitting and laughing with a chimchar she guessed was Claire’s Blazer. “Those two get along”, she remarked with a hum.

“Oh yeah when the two first met they hit it off instantly”, Claire smiled, brushing Sophie’s fur.

“Also helps that Blazer has a huge crush on Aura”, Lucy smirked brushing Silk’s fur.

“Seriously”? Essence said surprised.

“Oh yeah and it’s really obvious too everyone back home knows too”, Lucy said, Silk nodding in agreement.

Essence blinked then looked at the two again and noticed Blazer’s slightly flushed cheeks as Aura leaned on him with a smile. “Oh my god you’re right”, she gaped.

“Told you”, Lucy hummed.

“But wait does Aura feel the same”? Essence asked.

“Mmm it’s a little hard to tell”, Claire said thoughtfully.

“I say she does but she’s in denial”, Lucy said.

“How so”? Essence asked.

“Getting all flustered, quickly saying it wasn’t like that, stuff like that”, Lucy chuckled.

“Heh reminds me of someone else I know”, Essence smirked, glancing at Sparks who was sitting next to her.

Sparks looked at her with a scowl before having a thoughtful look before getting up and walked over to Aura and Blazer as they looked up noticing him. Oh hey Blazer, Aura spoke.

(Hello Sparks), Blazer said politely.

(Hi, hey Aura come with me for a sec? Wanna ask you something), Sparks said.

Hmm? Sure I don’t mind. That ok with you Blazer? Aura asked.

(Not at all), Blazer nodded with a smile.

Aura smiled and nodded getting up and followed Sparks to a more secluded part of the forest. So what did you wanted to talk about? Aura asked.

(I overheard something from Lucy and Essence and I want to confirm it), he said

Confirm what? She asked confused.

He glanced at her and smirked making her twitch. “Something tells me Im not gonna like this”, she thought.

(You’re pretty close to Blazer aren’t you), he remarked lightly.

Huh? Well yeah I’ve known him for years now, so what? She asked suspiciously.

(Oh nothing just thinking you must really like Blazer), he smirked.

What? Well of course I like Blaz-!

Aura blinked for a moment before flushing in realization getting flustered. I-I mean I like him as a friend! Not what you think or anything! She quickly said.

(Oh? But I didnt say anything), he smirked.

Y-you little! You’re doing this on purpose to mess with me! She growled.

(Don’t know what you mean I was only curious thats all), he said ‘innocently’.

Why you, She began annoyed.

Then she stiffened silent confusing him. (What’s wrong? Meowth got your-)

Run now, she said suddenly.

(Huh? Why should I)? He began.

Beedrill suddenly flew up from the trees making them sweatdrop. That’s why, she said.

Now run!

They quickly began running as the Beedrill chased after them.

“Oh man I didnt realize how late it got”! Lucy gasped, seeing the setting sun.

“Guess we’ll have to camp here for the night”.

“Ah sleeping in nature how I love it”, Aries said happily.

“I’ll start dinner”, Lucy sweatdropped.

Claire gave a weak chuckle as she and Nina started a small campfire when she noticed Essence looking around. “Is something wrong Essence”? She asked.

“I can’t find Sparks anywhere”, Essence frowned.

“Hey now that you mention it I don’t see Aura either”, Lucy frowned, looking up.

“Ah I wouldn’t worry I’m sure those two are fine”, Aries grinned.

Ah! Ok we lost them!

Aura and Sparks panted after managing to out run the horde of Beedrill. (Geez attack us out of nowhere, what’s their problem?!) Sparks growled.

We must’ve been near their nests and they got territorial when we got near, she panted.

This is the problem with Beedrill they’re hot headed and jump to conclusions way too quickly!

(That’s for sure), he grunted in agreement.

They looked around and he noticed that it was becoming night time. (It’s getting dark we should get-!)

Sparks turned to face Aura and grew wide eyed in shock.

Lucy stirred the stew she was cooking a frown on her face as she did.

“You ok”?

Lucy looked up at Essence who had a worried look. “I’m fine just worried about Aura”, Lucy sighed.

“I wouldnt worry too much Sparks may seem rude but he’s a good pokemon he’ll have Aura’s back”, Essence assured.

“I bet he will but that’s not it”, Lucy frowned, confusing Essence.

“The thing is it’s night now and Aura doesn’t do well in the dark”.

Sparks was shocked to see Aura shaking a frightened look on her face. (Hey Aura what’s wrong?) He questioned, placing a paw on her shoulder.

AHH! She shrieked, moving back.

(Hey calm down it’s only me!) He said shocked.

S-Sparks? Right, right you’re here, she sighed shaking.

(What’s up with you? You’re shaking like a leaf), he frowned.

L-let’s just say I don’t do so well in the dark, freaks me out, she muttered.

“It freaks her out? Her? She doesn’t seem like the type”, he thought surprised with a frown.

He then sighed using his tail, he grabbed her making her gasp. HEY! What the?! She began.

(Relax it’s still me), he assured, placing her on his back.

She blinked surprised feeling herself placed on his back feeling his warm fur. (Just relax you can rest on my back and I’ll take us back to the others), he said gently.

She was surprised by the gentle tone before she began to relax letting herself be lulled to sleep he noticed this smiling in relief before walking off.

“That’s it I’m looking for them”.

They looked at Lucy who had finished cooking dinner. “They should’ve been back by now I’m going to get them”, Lucy said.

“I’ll come with you I’m worried about them both”, Essence frowned.

“Come on you two I’m sure they’re fine”, Aries began.

“They’re back”, Claire said softly.

They all looked up surprised to see Sparks walking over to them a sleeping Aura on his back. “There you are Sparks! You had us worried”, Essence said, as Sparks walked to her and Lucy.

“Lux”, Sparks said, looking at Aura.

He shook her with his muzzle making the Riolu groan and open her eyes. Mmm… Where? She began.

“Hey Aura, you ok”? Lucy asked with a gentle smile.

Aura blinked surprised looking around and remembered looking down at Sparks before quickly getting off him. Y-yeah Im fine, she said quickly.

Lucy chuckled at her partner patting Aura’s head. “You guys must be hungry I already laid out the pokemon food go eat with the others”, she said.

Aura nodded quickly going to sit and eat Sparks turned to follow. “Oh Sparks thank you for helping Aura”, Lucy spoke.

Sparks stopped for a moment giving a light shrug before going to eat Lucy and Essence smiled. “He can be rough but he’s a huge softie”, Essence grinned, making Lucy giggle.

Aura was silently eating as Sparks sat next to her and began eating she swallowed as she looked at him a little nervous. Hey um… Thanks for well… Back there, she said.

He looked at her and gave a light smirk. (Don’t worry about it and though Blazer must really give you comfort from the dark), he remarked innocently.

She flushed and weakly scowled at him. You’re impossible sometimes, she said.

He chuckled playfully flicking his tail at her as she playfully swatted at it the two beginning to form an unbreakable friendship.

reblog.comment:
Essence, Claire, and Aries belong to Kimmy-ko while Lucy and Allen belongs to me so enjoy.

Claire gave a weak chuckle as she and Nina started a small campfire when she noticed Essence looking around. “Is something wrong Essence”? She asked.

“I can’t find Sparks anywhere”, Essence frowned.

“Hey now that you mention it I don’t see Aura either”, Lucy frowned, looking up.

“Ah I wouldn’t worry I’m sure those two are fine”, Aries grinned.

Ah! Ok we lost them!

Aura and Sparks panted after managing to out run the horde of Beedrill. (Geez attack us out of nowhere, what’s their problem?!) Sparks growled.

We must’ve been near their nests and they got territorial when we got near, she panted.

This is the problem with Beedrill they’re hot headed and jump to conclusions way too quickly!

(That’s for sure), he grunted in agreement.

They looked around and he noticed that it was becoming night time. (It’s getting dark we should get-!)

Sparks turned to face Aura and grew wide eyed in shock.

Lucy stirred the stew she was cooking a frown on her face as she did.

“You ok”?

Lucy looked up at Essence who had a worried look. “I’m fine just worried about Aura”, Lucy sighed.

“I wouldnt worry too much Sparks may seem rude but he’s a good pokemon he’ll have Aura’s back”, Essence assured.

“I bet he will but that’s not it”, Lucy frowned, confusing Essence.

“The thing is it’s night now and Aura doesn’t do well in the dark”.

Sparks was shocked to see Aura shaking a frightened look on her face. (Hey Aura what’s wrong?) He questioned, placing a paw on her shoulder.

AHH! She shrieked, moving back.

(Hey calm down it’s only me!) He said shocked.

S-Sparks? Right, right you’re here, she sighed shaking.

(What’s up with you? You’re shaking like a leaf), he frowned.

L-let’s just say I don’t do so well in the dark, freaks me out, she muttered.

“It freaks her out? Her? She doesn’t seem like the type”, he thought surprised with a frown.

He then sighed using his tail, he grabbed her making her gasp. HEY! What the?! She began.

(Relax it’s still me), he assured, placing her on his back.

She blinked surprised feeling herself placed on his back feeling his warm fur. (Just relax you can rest on my back and I’ll take us back to the others), he said gently.

She was surprised by the gentle tone before she began to relax letting herself be lulled to sleep he noticed this smiling in relief before walking off.

“That’s it I’m looking for them”.

They looked at Lucy who had finished cooking dinner. “They should’ve been back by now I’m going to get them”, Lucy said.

“I’ll come with you I’m worried about them both”, Essence frowned.

“Come on you two I’m sure they’re fine”, Aries began.

“They’re back”, Claire said softly.

They all looked up surprised to see Sparks walking over to them a sleeping Aura on his back. “There you are Sparks! You had us worried”, Essence said, as Sparks walked to her and Lucy.

“Lux”, Sparks said, looking at Aura.

He shook her with his muzzle making the Riolu groan and open her eyes. Mmm… Where? She began.

“Hey Aura, you ok”? Lucy asked with a gentle smile.

Aura blinked surprised looking around and remembered looking down at Sparks before quickly getting off him. Y-yeah Im fine, she said quickly.

Lucy chuckled at her partner patting Aura’s head. “You guys must be hungry I already laid out the pokemon food go eat with the others”, she said.

Aura nodded quickly going to sit and eat Sparks turned to follow. “Oh Sparks thank you for helping Aura”, Lucy spoke.

Sparks stopped for a moment giving a light shrug before going to eat Lucy and Essence smiled. “He can be rough but he’s a huge softie”, Essence grinned, making Lucy giggle.

Aura was silently eating as Sparks sat next to her and began eating she swallowed as she looked at him a little nervous. Hey um… Thanks for well… Back there, she said.

He looked at her and gave a light smirk. (Don’t worry about it and though Blazer must really give you comfort from the dark), he remarked innocently.

She flushed and weakly scowled at him. You’re impossible sometimes, she said.

He chuckled playfully flicking his tail at her as she playfully swatted at it the two beginning to form an unbreakable friendship.
trail.content:
Essence, Claire, and Aries belong to Kimmy-ko while Lucy and Allen belongs to me so enjoy.

Chapter 5

“So this is Santalune Forest”.

The group were walking to Santalune City for their first gym battle but had to cross the forest first. “Yeah once we cross Santalune Forest we’ll be at Santalune City easy”, Lucy said.

“Wow this place is awesome”! Aries grinned, looking around the forest gleefully.

“Such beauty of nature”!

The girls and their pokemon sweatdropped while Slash sighed. “He’s a grass type trainer alright”, Lucy sighed.

“Oh the others should enjoy this”, Aries grinned, getting out two pokeballs.

“Come out Chestnut, Blade”!

Aries’s Chespie was sent out along with a Grovyle to Lucy’s and Claire’s surprise. “A Grovyle”, Claire gasped, getting out her pokedex.

Grovyle, the Wood Gecko pokemon and the evolved form of Treecko. Grovyle has powerful legs which allow it to move quickly and jump with great power

“This is my Grovyle, Blade I got him as my starter when he was a Treecko”, Aries grinned.

“Grov”, Blade nodded.

“Wait starter? You’re from Hoenn”? Lucy said surprised.

“I thought you were from Sinnoh like Essence”, Claire said.

“Nah I’m from Hoenn and started my journey there I met Essence when I decided to go to Sinnoh”, Aries explained.

“And I’ve been stuck with him since”, Essence sighed.

“Oh you know you love me Essey”, Aries grinned.

“Yeah,yeah”, Essence said lightly.

Lucy and Claire blinked at the two before looking at one another and shrugged. “Guess that’s how they always act”, Lucy remarked.

“Why not we let out all our pokemon for a small break”.

“That sounds good”, Claire nodded.

They all let out their pokemon as they sat and relaxed Essence noticed Aura sitting and laughing with a chimchar she guessed was Claire’s Blazer. “Those two get along”, she remarked with a hum.

“Oh yeah when the two first met they hit it off instantly”, Claire smiled, brushing Sophie’s fur.

“Also helps that Blazer has a huge crush on Aura”, Lucy smirked brushing Silk’s fur.

“Seriously”? Essence said surprised.

“Oh yeah and it’s really obvious too everyone back home knows too”, Lucy said, Silk nodding in agreement.

Essence blinked then looked at the two again and noticed Blazer’s slightly flushed cheeks as Aura leaned on him with a smile. “Oh my god you’re right”, she gaped.

“Told you”, Lucy hummed.

“But wait does Aura feel the same”? Essence asked.

“Mmm it’s a little hard to tell”, Claire said thoughtfully.

“I say she does but she’s in denial”, Lucy said.

“How so”? Essence asked.

“Getting all flustered, quickly saying it wasn’t like that, stuff like that”, Lucy chuckled.

“Heh reminds me of someone else I know”, Essence smirked, glancing at Sparks who was sitting next to her.

Sparks looked at her with a scowl before having a thoughtful look before getting up and walked over to Aura and Blazer as they looked up noticing him. Oh hey Blazer, Aura spoke.

(Hello Sparks), Blazer said politely.

(Hi, hey Aura come with me for a sec? Wanna ask you something), Sparks said.

Hmm? Sure I don’t mind. That ok with you Blazer? Aura asked.

(Not at all), Blazer nodded with a smile.

Aura smiled and nodded getting up and followed Sparks to a more secluded part of the forest. So what did you wanted to talk about? Aura asked.

(I overheard something from Lucy and Essence and I want to confirm it), he said

Confirm what? She asked confused.

He glanced at her and smirked making her twitch. “Something tells me Im not gonna like this”, she thought.

(You’re pretty close to Blazer aren’t you), he remarked lightly.

Huh? Well yeah I’ve known him for years now, so what? She asked suspiciously.

(Oh nothing just thinking you must really like Blazer), he smirked.

What? Well of course I like Blaz-!

Aura blinked for a moment before flushing in realization getting flustered. I-I mean I like him as a friend! Not what you think or anything! She quickly said.

(Oh? But I didnt say anything), he smirked.

Y-you little! You’re doing this on purpose to mess with me! She growled.

(Don’t know what you mean I was only curious thats all), he said ‘innocently’.

Why you, She began annoyed.

Then she stiffened silent confusing him. (What’s wrong? Meowth got your-)

Run now, she said suddenly.

(Huh? Why should I)? He began.

Beedrill suddenly flew up from the trees making them sweatdrop. That’s why, she said.

Now run!

They quickly began running as the Beedrill chased after them.

“Oh man I didnt realize how late it got”! Lucy gasped, seeing the setting sun.

“Guess we’ll have to camp here for the night”.

“Ah sleeping in nature how I love it”, Aries said happily.

“I’ll start dinner”, Lucy sweatdropped.

Claire gave a weak chuckle as she and Nina started a small campfire when she noticed Essence looking around. “Is something wrong Essence”? She asked.

“I can’t find Sparks anywhere”, Essence frowned.

“Hey now that you mention it I don’t see Aura either”, Lucy frowned, looking up.

“Ah I wouldn’t worry I’m sure those two are fine”, Aries grinned.

Ah! Ok we lost them!

Aura and Sparks panted after managing to out run the horde of Beedrill. (Geez attack us out of nowhere, what’s their problem?!) Sparks growled.

We must’ve been near their nests and they got territorial when we got near, she panted.

This is the problem with Beedrill they’re hot headed and jump to conclusions way too quickly!

(That’s for sure), he grunted in agreement.

They looked around and he noticed that it was becoming night time. (It’s getting dark we should get-!)

Sparks turned to face Aura and grew wide eyed in shock.

Lucy stirred the stew she was cooking a frown on her face as she did.

“You ok”?

Lucy looked up at Essence who had a worried look. “I’m fine just worried about Aura”, Lucy sighed.

“I wouldnt worry too much Sparks may seem rude but he’s a good pokemon he’ll have Aura’s back”, Essence assured.

“I bet he will but that’s not it”, Lucy frowned, confusing Essence.

“The thing is it’s night now and Aura doesn’t do well in the dark”.

Sparks was shocked to see Aura shaking a frightened look on her face. (Hey Aura what’s wrong?) He questioned, placing a paw on her shoulder.

AHH! She shrieked, moving back.

(Hey calm down it’s only me!) He said shocked.

S-Sparks? Right, right you’re here, she sighed shaking.

(What’s up with you? You’re shaking like a leaf), he frowned.

L-let’s just say I don’t do so well in the dark, freaks me out, she muttered.

“It freaks her out? Her? She doesn’t seem like the type”, he thought surprised with a frown.

He then sighed using his tail, he grabbed her making her gasp. HEY! What the?! She began.

(Relax it’s still me), he assured, placing her on his back.

She blinked surprised feeling herself placed on his back feeling his warm fur. (Just relax you can rest on my back and I’ll take us back to the others), he said gently.

She was surprised by the gentle tone before she began to relax letting herself be lulled to sleep he noticed this smiling in relief before walking off.

“That’s it I’m looking for them”.

They looked at Lucy who had finished cooking dinner. “They should’ve been back by now I’m going to get them”, Lucy said.

“I’ll come with you I’m worried about them both”, Essence frowned.

“Come on you two I’m sure they’re fine”, Aries began.

“They’re back”, Claire said softly.

They all looked up surprised to see Sparks walking over to them a sleeping Aura on his back. “There you are Sparks! You had us worried”, Essence said, as Sparks walked to her and Lucy.

“Lux”, Sparks said, looking at Aura.

He shook her with his muzzle making the Riolu groan and open her eyes. Mmm… Where? She began.

“Hey Aura, you ok”? Lucy asked with a gentle smile.

Aura blinked surprised looking around and remembered looking down at Sparks before quickly getting off him. Y-yeah Im fine, she said quickly.

Lucy chuckled at her partner patting Aura’s head. “You guys must be hungry I already laid out the pokemon food go eat with the others”, she said.

Aura nodded quickly going to sit and eat Sparks turned to follow. “Oh Sparks thank you for helping Aura”, Lucy spoke.

Sparks stopped for a moment giving a light shrug before going to eat Lucy and Essence smiled. “He can be rough but he’s a huge softie”, Essence grinned, making Lucy giggle.

Aura was silently eating as Sparks sat next to her and began eating she swallowed as she looked at him a little nervous. Hey um… Thanks for well… Back there, she said.

He looked at her and gave a light smirk. (Don’t worry about it and though Blazer must really give you comfort from the dark), he remarked innocently.

She flushed and weakly scowled at him. You’re impossible sometimes, she said.

He chuckled playfully flicking his tail at her as she playfully swatted at it the two beginning to form an unbreakable friendship.

blog.name: friendsafariserver
blog.title: Friend Safari!
blog.description:
Friend Safari is a SFW, OC-friendly, paragraph-style roleplay server for main series Pokémon games. From Kanto to Alola, the whole Pokémon world is your Cloyster! Members of this server are allowed a total of four played characters, with at least one required to be canonical.

The server is run by a team of five mods who you can learn more about via the mods page. We cultivate an easygoing and open atmosphere, with member comfort and happiness being our top priority.

All of the links are in the drop down menu under Rowlet, labeled Pokémon! Hovering over each Pokémon will tell you what page they link to!

summary: Welcome to the Friend Safari! Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region,...
body:
Welcome to the Friend Safari!

Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region, multiple modes for character interactions, and plenty of in-character events, ours is an active and welcoming group always looking for new members! To learn more about our server, head over to our rules!

Reblog this ad, stop by our blog and check us out!

It's Pokemon.            
Alex. He/Him. This blog only consist of Pokemon content, my fanfiction writing, my art, and so much more!

summary: Pokemon Fanfiction Chapter 5 part 2: The Headmistress
title: Pokemon Fanfiction Chapter 5 part 2: The Headmistress
body:
“And you!”

The Magnezone floated over to Alex’s force field. “You have never done anything wrong on this campus, and now all of sudden you can’t keep control and try to battle Wendell! You’re lucky your record is clean, or you would be following suit with Wendell!”

She looked down at Igneel from the air, “Take care of your Pokémon, if that Charmander dies tonight, you will be expelled from this university for a poor display of taking care of your Pokémon. And that is taking it lightly. This is your only warning, fire trainer.”

Alex looked down as well, “Yes Headmistress.”

“Now get out of my sight before I decide to let the Magnemites electrocute you both.”

She snapped her fingers and the Magnemite force fields lowered them down and dispersed. As the Magnemites flew up the Magnezone disappeared into the sunset.

As soon as the Magnemites dispersed, Alex ran over to Igneel and picked him up off the ground. Alex looked around and noticed that Wendell and his Weedle had scurried away, but the more saddening thing was he realized was Bethany had left too. But he didn’t have time to think about that. He checked Charmander’s pulse and could still hear it. He pulled out his phone and quickly scanned Igneel’s vitals. They were still okay; however, the poison and stab wounds had done a lot to him. He pulled out an Antidote and quickly started spraying it onto the infected areas of Igneel. He was badly injured, his veins were now exposed and purple, telling him that the poison had spread all over his body, the large stab wound from Weedle’s head spike had started to grow gross and infected. Luckily though, the small golden lizard was still breathing and when being sprayed with the Antidote and given a small blue berry to eat, the tail started to burn brighter. He just needed to take him to the nurse’s office quickly.

He stood up and started running back to the campus through the clearing. He held Igneel like a baby as the Charmander lay unconscious in his arms, barely breathing and Alex could tell the small golden lizard was in a lot of pain. I’m so sorry Igneel…

title: Monster Spotlight: Assorted Pokemon (Kanto Edition)
excerpt: DISCLAIMER: ALL PICTURES FOR THIS ARTICLE WERE TAKEN FROM GOOGLE IMAGE SEARCH OR SCREENCAPPED FROM YOUTUBE VIDEOS OF GAMEPLAY. I’D CITE SOURCES BUT THERE ARE LIKE 40 DIFFERENT PICTURES HERE …
